lead_paragraph: We publish, in another part of The Times, a detailed and connected history of the tragedy at Christiana. It is written by the son of Mr. GORSUCH, the claimant of the negroes, who is a clergyman, and a man of good standing and character. His narrative is undoubtedly reliable, and presents an accurate statement of all the circumstances of this atrocious outrage.
abstract: Account of the matter from J.S. Gorsach
